typeMetadata.name: Custom Image
typeMetadata.description: Allows you to embed any image, for example a tracking pixel.
typeMetadata.help: This tag allows you to add for example a transparent tracking pixel into your website.

row.name: customImageSrc
row.title: Image URL
row.description: You can define any image URL. We recommend to define a URL that starts with "//" so it will work on HTTP and HTTPS pages. If your website only supports HTTPS, it should start with "https://".

row.name: cacheBusterEnabled
row.title: Enable Cache Buster
row.description: Makes sure the image will be fetched again every time it is added to the page by adding a URL parameter to the image URL with a random value, for example "?mtmcb=12345"..
